Description:
Detects regsvr32 execution to download and install DLLs located remotely where the address is an IP address.

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potentially Suspicious Regsvr32 HTTP IP Pattern
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '% /i:http://1%' or command like '% /i:http://2%' or command like '% /i:http://3%' or command like '% /i:http://4%' or command like '% /i:http://5%' or command like '% /i:http://6%' or command like '% /i:http://7%' or command like '% /i:http://8%' or command like '% /i:http://9%' or command like '% /i:https://1%' or command like '% /i:https://2%' or command like '% /i:https://3%' or command like '% /i:https://4%' or command like '% /i:https://5%' or command like '% /i:https://6%' or command like '% /i:https://7%' or command like '% /i:https://8%' or command like '% /i:https://9%' or command like '% -i:http://1%' or command like '% -i:http://2%' or command like '% -i:http://3%' or command like '% -i:http://4%' or command like '% -i:http://5%' or command like '% -i:http://6%' or command like '% -i:http://7%' or command like '% -i:http://8%' or command like '% -i:http://9%' or command like '% -i:https://1%' or command like '% -i:https://2%' or command like '% -i:https://3%' or command like '% -i:https://4%' or command like '% -i:https://5%' or command like '% -i:https://6%' or command like '% -i:https://7%' or command like '% -i:https://8%' or command like '% -i:https://9%') and (process_path like '%\regsvr32.exe' and original_file_name = 'regsvr32.exe'))
